name: KLEE
description:
Project KLEE is a Single Player Turn-Based JRPG that tells about a senior high school student in a world where super power is common thing that everyone has who has a problem because she is born without those power.


Story Overview

Sora is a girl who lives in Orioch, a peaceful and one of the biggest city on Zariya kingdom, who doesn't have a super power and now she is a student in senior high magic-school. Magic power is a common things for everyone to have in this world so Sora have to struggling to study in the school.

One day, when Sora cleaning a room that never been used, she found a suspicious box with a seal on it. She try to open the box and suddenly the box made a small explosion with white-flash light. Before Sora passed out, she saw a mysterious creature behind the light. After Sora regained her consciousness, she realized he can use light-type magic, an element which very rare to have, and the creature that she saw before follow her to anywhere she go.

Now, Sora's journey has start with her 2 friends to find the truth and the purpose of these mysterious creature.


Concept
  • Visual Novel
    Project KLEE using visual novel to tell you about the tale of Sora and KLEE. Player can move to the next dialogue using click on the mouse or pressing the "space" button.

  • Turn-Based Combat
    Project KLEE main feature is Turn-Based Combat which determined by the timeline (charge-bar) that shows on the screen. Player can do the battle alone or with other character (maximum 2 other character) with total 3 character, so do the opponent team. The timeline will be paused to let the player choose the action they want when the character has reach the finish line on the charge-bar.


  • Elements
    There are 5 elements in total on this world with 3 regular elements (water, fire, and earth) and 2 rare elements (dark and light). Every element has a reaction if combined with the other element to caused an extra effect.



  • Stages
    Currently, there are only 3 levels on this game with different difficulties. Player will be facing the final boss (pure dark element) on the 3rd level.

Character
  1. Sora - Main Character



  2. Echidna - Main Villain

Platform

Project KLEE can be played on Windows and Mac.
